verses.2: “Israel miteʼ phu Midian-te tungah la in. Tua khit ciangin na mipihte kiang na zuan ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.3: Tua ahih ciangin Moses in mite kiangah, “Midian-teʼ tungah Topaʼ phulakna a sem ding, Midian-te a do dingin noteʼ lak panin mi pawl khat galhiam guan un.
verses.4: Israel minamte nam khat panin mi tul khat ciat gal sungah na kuansak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.5: Tua ahih ciangin Israel mi tul tampi sung panin minam khat ah tul khat, tul sawm le tul nih galdo dingin galhiam kiguan hi.
verses.6: Moses in amaute, minam khat panin tul khat ciat, biakinn nate le patau koh nadingin peengkulte siampi Eleazarʼ tapa Finehas kengsakin ama makaihna tawh gal sungah a kuansak hi.
verses.7: Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Midian-te do uh a, pasal khempeuh that uh hi.
verses.8: Amaute in midangte le Midian kumpi ngate Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur le Reba a thahna uh ah, Beorʼ tapa Balaam zong namsau tawh that khawm uh hi.
verses.9: Israel-te in Midian nupite le a tate uh manin, a bawngte, a tuuhonte khempeuh le a na khempeuh uh laksak uh hi.
verses.10: Amauʼ teenna a khuapi khempeuh uh le a giahphual khempeuh uh mei tawh halsak uh a,
verses.11: a mat sa khempeuh uh, mihing ganhing ciahpih khin uh hi.
verses.12: Tua ciangin amaute in Jerikho nai, Jordan kiang, Moab zanglei-a a giahphual uh a Moses le siampi Eleazar le Israel mihonte kiangah a galmatte uh le a na lakte uh tunpih uh hi.
verses.13: Moses, siampi Eleazar le mihon makaite khempeuh zong giahphual pua ah vai dawn dingin pai uh hi.
verses.14: Galdona panin a hong ciah mi tul tampi a ukte le mi za tampi a uk galkap ulianteʼ tungah Moses heh hi.
verses.15: Moses in amaute tungah, “Numei khempeuh hingkhawi na hi uh hiam?
verses.16: En un, hih mite in Balaamʼ lamlahna tawh Peor ah Topaʼ tungah Israel mite zuautatsak hi. Tua ahih manin Topaʼ mihonte lakah gimna hong tung hi.
verses.17: Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, a khangnote lakah pasal peuhmah that unla, pasal tawh a lum khawm sa numei peuhmah zong that un.
verses.18: Ahih hangin pasal tawh a lum khawm nai lo nungaknote khempeuh note adingin kem un.
verses.19: Tu-in note lakah mi khat peuhpeuh a thatte le a kithat sa a lawng mi peuhmahte, giahphual pua ah ni sagih sung om un. A ni thum ni le a ni sagih ni-in note le na galmatte uh na kisiansuah ding uh hi.
verses.20: Puan khempeuh, savun tawh a kibawl na khempeuh, keel mul tawh a kibawl na khempeuh le sing tawh a kibawl na khempeuh na siansuah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.21: Siampi Eleazar in galdona ah a va kuan galkapte tungah, “ Topa in Moses a thupiak thukham ngeina hih bang ahi hi:
verses.22: Kham, ngun, sumngo, sik, dal le haknaw,
verses.23: mei a do zo peuhmahte bek mei ah na hal ding uh a, a siang hi ding hi. Ahi zongin mei a do zo lo peuhmahte, nitna siansuahna tui tawh kisiansuah dinga, tui ah na sawp ding uh hi.
verses.24: A ni sagih ni-in na puante uh na sawp ding uh a, note a siangtho na hi ding uh hi. Tua khit ciangin giahphual ah nong ciahkik thei pan ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.26: “Nang le siampi Eleazar le mihon beh lutangte in gal sunga a kiman mihing le ganhingte sim un.
verses.27: Gal sunga a kingahte khen nih suah inla, galdo dingin a kuan galhangte le inn-a om mihonte tungah a kikimin hawmsak in.
verses.28: Galdo dingin a kuan khia galkapteʼ tung panin mite, bawngtalte, late le tuuhonte za nga ciangin Topaʼ siah dingin khat ciat la in.
verses.29: Alang a ngah uh sung panin la inla, Topaʼ tungah biakna-in siampi Eleazar tungah pia in.
verses.30: Israel mihonte in alang a ngah uh sung panin mite, bawngtalte, late, tuuhonte, ganhing khempeuh, sawm nga ciangin khat ciat la inla, Topaʼ biakbuk a kem Levi mite tungah pia in,” a ci hi.
verses.31: Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Moses le siampi Eleazar in a sem uh hi.
verses.32: Tu-in galkapte in a lak gal sunga a mat uh a om lai a kihawm dingte: Tuu tul za guk le tul sawm sagih le tul nga,
verses.33: bawng tul sawm sagih le tul nih,
verses.34: la tul sawm guk le tul khat,
verses.35: le pasal tawh a lum khawm nai lo nungak a vekpi-in tul sawm thum le tul nih ahi hi.
verses.36: Alang ahi, gal sungah a kuan khia miteʼ ngah pen tuu tul za thum le tul sawm thum le tul sagih le za nga hi a,
verses.37: Topaʼ tuu-siah pen tuu za guk le sawm sagih le nga ahi hi.
verses.38: Bawngte tul sawm thum le tul guk hi a, Topaʼ siah sawm sagih le nih ahi hi.
verses.39: Late tul sawm thum le za nga hi a, tua sung panin Topaʼ siah sawm guk le khat ahi hi.
verses.40: Nungak tul sawm le tul guk hi a, tua sung panin Topaʼ siah nungak sawm thum le nih ahi hi.
verses.41: Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Moses in siampi Eleazarʼ tungah Topa biak nading siah a pia hi.
verses.42: Galdo dingin a kuan khia mite adingin Moses in a khenkhiat zah mah Israel mihonte in ngah uh a,
verses.43: mihonte in a ngah alang teng pen tuu tul za thum le tul sawm thum le tul sagih le za nga,
verses.44: bawng tul sawm thum le tul guk,
verses.45: la tul sawm thum le za nga,
verses.46: nungak tul sawm le tul guk ahi hi.
verses.47: Israel-te in a ngah alang sung panin Moses in mihing le ganhing sawm nga ciangin khat ciat la-in, Topa in ama tungah a thupiak bangin Topaʼ biakbuk a kem Levi mite tungah a pia hi.
verses.48: Tua ciangin galkap tul tampite tunga uliante ahi, tul tampi a ukte le za tampi a ukte, Moses kiangah hong pai uh a,
verses.49: “Koteʼ ukna nuai-a a om galkapte, na nasem kote in ka sim khin uh a, koteʼ kiang panin mi khat zong a pelhem om lo hi.
verses.50: Kote in Topaʼ mai ah ko adingin kilemna bawl nading, Topa biak nadingin kham tawh a kibawl nate, banbuhte le taaute, min gelhna zungbuhte, bilbahte le khite ka muh ciat uh kong puak uh hi,” hong ci uh hi.
verses.51: Moses le siampi Eleazar in amauteʼ tung panin na-a a kibawl khamte a sang uh hi.
verses.52: Tul tampi a ukte le za tampi a ukteʼ tung panin a kingah, Topaʼ tungah biakna-in a piak uh khamte khempeuh shekel tul sawm le tul guk le za sagih le sawm nga a gik hi.
verses.53: (Gal sunga a kuan mite in amau ading ciat a la uh hi.)
verses.54: Moses le siampi Eleazar in tul tampi le za tampi a uk miteʼ tung panin khamte sang uh a, Israel mite adingin Topaʼ mai ah phawk tawntungna-in kikhopna buk sungah a koih uh hi.
